entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow near noon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
